# idgen4go
A fast, snowflake-alike ID generator for go.

## Usage
Get 
```go
go get github.com/thiinbit/idgen4go
```
Use
```go
import idg "github.com/thiinbit/idgen4go"

// Generate a new ID
id := idg.Next() // 10361665786741541

// Get the ID generation time （int64 timestamp of millis）
idTimestamp = idg.ExtractTimestamp(id) // 1580307213634

```
## Speed
It takes about 2.9150176646s to generate 4000000 (4 million) IDs. (use MacBookPro13,2018)      
The test results are as follows:
```text
Elapsed:  2.918287896s   
Elapsed:  2.868323365s   
Elapsed:  2.905395458s   
Elapsed:  2.934157172s   
Elapsed:  2.961245967s   
Elapsed:  2.913548921s   
Elapsed:  2.900666654s   
Elapsed:  2.947079175s   
Elapsed:  2.930321344s   
Elapsed:  2.871150694s   
```
